# More monkeys 


```{r}
#| eval: false
monkeyexp <- read_csv("../../data/monkeyexplorers.csv")

sjPlot::tab_model(
  lm(exploration_time ~ obj_type, df),
  lm(exploration_time ~ age + obj_type, df)
)
anova(
  lm(exploration_time ~ age + obj_type, df),
  lm(exploration_time ~ age + obj_type + obj_size + obj_colour, df)
)
```
